mapper.select: SELECT zei.temperature_id, zei.machine_id, zei.create_time, zei.`timestamp`, zei.ecg, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, re.start_time, zei.create_time) as useTimeMinutes FROM `zs_ecg_info` zei left join record_ecg re on zei.machine_id = re.machine_id WHERE re.status = 0 and re.record_status = 0 and zei.machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and zei.timestamp > #{timestamp,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY zei.TIMESTAMP limit 0,5;

SELECT zei.ecg, zei.`timestamp` AS dateTime FROM `zs_ecg_info` zei LEFT JOIN record_ecg re on re.`machine_id` = zei.`machine_id` left join record_base rb on re.base_id = rb.id WHERE re.status = 0 and rb.status = 0 and zei.`create_time` >= re.`start_time` AND zei.`create_time` <= now() AND rb.`id` = #{record_id, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY zei.`temperature_id`;

SELECT CONCAT('{', rb.`id`, ',', zei.`ecg`, ',', zei.create_time, '}', ',') FROM zs_ecg_info zei LEFT JOIN record_ecg re on re.`machine_id` = zei.`machine_id` left join record_base rb on re.base_id = rb.id WHERE zei.create_time < #{dateOfOneMonthAgo,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
